sentence.Network_en: Aggregates are compact and close to spherical in shape.

sentence.Network_en: We carry out a transformation to spherical polar coordinates.
Both spherical and regular crystalline forms are relatively rare.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: via late Latin from Greek sphairikos, from sphaira (see sphere)

entry.def: Something that is spherical is round like a ball.

example.tran: 紫色和金色的球形耳环

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to spheres or resembling a sphere;
2. having the shape of a sphere or ball;

sentences.sentence: "little globular houses like mud-wasp nests"- Zane Grey
